law.catch_line: The center director or the director's designee may release personal information about an inmate on a...

text.section:
The center director or the director's designee may release personal information about an inmate on a "need to know" basis to:
essential community resources and volunteer staff for the purpose of obtaining employment, training, education, or treatment services for the inmate on release; and
an individual who agrees to sponsor the inmate in the individual's home for authorized furloughs.
The inmate shall be informed of confidentiality requirements.
The staff of the center shall request that the inmate waive, in writing, the inmate's right of confidentiality for the purpose of implementing this section.
